title: "Nothing quite kills the joy of online gaming like latency"
body:
Meanwhile in Italy:

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/kHldkE6fQTU/maxresdefault.jpg

Note: I'm Italian and this post had some success in our board because it's not actually a joke :( so I wanted to share it with you guys.

replies.body: this doesn't belong here.  put it in gameplay.
Framerate drops kill the joy of all kinds of gaming

I remember when my framerate was so slow during my first few weeks of playing, that I thought MF's only damage ability other than her ult was her E, because it was the only one I could see....

P.S. I was playing at 3 fps, 10 fps spikes if I was lucky.
How you managed to tolerate it for this long is beyond me

I got a new laptop at the end of season 3, then after that I built my own gaming computer which is what I have been using for the last year. You have no idea how nice it is to play League of Legends on Ultra High Settings with over 300 fps.

I don't understand how you persevered til season 3 like that...
And you're right, I have no idea *cries*
